# Better Exams — Full Content Index

> Complete listing of all subjects and year ranges available on betterexams.ie.
> For a concise overview, see https://betterexams.ie/llms.txt

## Site Overview

Better Exams provides free access to Irish state examination past papers and marking schemes. All documents are sourced from the State Examinations Commission (examinations.ie).

- Homepage: https://betterexams.ie/
- Side-by-side viewer: https://betterexams.ie/v2
- JSON API: https://betterexams.ie/api/{cert}/{subject}/{year}

## Leaving Certificate (64 subjects)

Index page: https://betterexams.ie/leaving-cert/

- **Accounting**: 30 years (1996–2025), 200 documents — https://betterexams.ie/leaving-cert/accounting/
- **Agricultural Economics**: 24 years (1996–2019), 144 documents — https://betterexams.ie/leaving-cert/agricultural-economics/

## API Usage

Retrieve structured JSON for any subject/year:

GET https://betterexams.ie/api/{cert-slug}/{subject-slug}/{year}

Example: https://betterexams.ie/api/leaving-cert/mathematics/2025

Response includes: certificate name, subject name, year, page URL, and categorised document list with PDF download links.

To discover available subjects, use: GET https://betterexams.ie/api/{cert-slug}
Example: https://betterexams.ie/api/leaving-cert
